name: Raccohobo
description:
A game made for the  Global Game Jam 2019 (« What Home means to you ? ») in collaboration with ESMI students

Once upon a Time, a little Hobo raccoon, tired of his poverty, decide to build his HOME. Collect scraps and build your HOME ! Be careful of the angry Hobo pigs… They’ll want to steal your stuff…

Team :

  • Alex Bard : Concept Artist, Modeling/Texturing
  • Marie Corniglion : Concept Artist, Animation 2D
  • Adrien Gilles : Modeling/Texturing, Animation 3D
  • Maxime Grenier : Modeling/Texturing
  • Mathieu Guignard : Modeling/Texturing
  • Gabriel Jaulin : Modeling/Texturing, Animation 3D
  • Antoine Jonac : Modeling/Texturing, Integration
  • Camille Latasa : Modeling/Texturing
  • Yoren Martin : Integration
  • Théo Mercier : Animation 3D
  • Benjamin Michel : Modeling/Texturing, Ux designer
  • Kévin Reilhac : Développer
  • Kevin Tisaire : Modeling/Texturing, Integration
